Uses of Interface
jibe.sdk.client.simple.SimpleConnection

Packages that use SimpleConnection

jibe.sdk.client.simple.filetransfer High level API for peer-to-peer file sharing 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.session High level API for low-latency, peer-to-peer data connections over RTP/UDP

jibe.sdk.client.simple.videosharing High level API for peer-to-peer video sessions 
 

Uses of SimpleConnection in jibe.sdk.client.simple.call
 

Classes in jibe.sdk.client.simple.call that implement SimpleConnection
 class AudioCallConnection
          High-level API class, offering convenient set-up of app-to-app VoIP audio calls.

          High-level API class, offering convenient set-up of app-to-app file transfers.
 

Uses of SimpleConnection in jibe.sdk.client.simple.session
 

Classes in jibe.sdk.client.simple.session that implement SimpleConnection
 class DatagramSocketConnection
          High-level API class, used for the convenient set-up of low-latency, app-to-app data connections.
 class JibeBundleTransferConnection
          High-level API class, used for the convenient transfer of data using low-latency, app-to-app data connections.
 

Uses of SimpleConnection in jibe.sdk.client.simple.videocall
 

Classes in jibe.sdk.client.simple.videocall that implement SimpleConnection

          High-level API class, offering convenient set-up of app-to-app IP video calls with VoIP audio.

Classes in jibe.sdk.client.simple.videosharing that implement SimpleConnection

          High-level API class, offering convenient set-up of app-to-app live video sharing/streaming (one-way).
